original_text: Peter answered, ‘No, Lord, I would certainly not do that. I have never eaten an animal that our Law says is unclean.’
korean_text: 베드로가 이르되 주여 그럴 수 없나이다 속되고 깨끗하지 아니한 것을 내가 결코 먹지 아니하였나이다 한대

sentences.original_text: I would certainly not do that.
I have never eaten an animal
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 결코 동물을 먹어본 적이 없습니다

sentences.original_text: that our Law says is unclean.'
